timeline.bodyText: Since you add  - retrying to the info logging above, maybe add something like  - max retries hit here
timeline.author: HoustonPutman

replies.bodyText: max retries hit is a little tricky to determine exactly since e.g. commError and other things influence the logic. But inclusion of MAX_STALE_RETRIES in the logging could make it clear(er) when "max retries hit" was likely the case.
